name: The Missing Slimes
description:
A simple game made for the Brackey's game jam 2021.1. A simple beat em' up about a slime searching for his four missing parts. I'm primarily looking for feedback on the gameplay loop and how much fun the general game is. Level design tips would be nice as well. Also this game hasn't been tested a ton, so on certain systems and resolutions the game may not work, be sure to leave a comment if it doesn't

Controls

- Move with WASD

-Jump with space

- Abilities are on Q and E

-Dash with Shift

-Attack with left mouse click

-Pause with escape

Credits
